Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands

Class SingleArgumentCommandTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.commands.SingleArgumentCommandTest
class SingleArgumentCommandTest extends Object
Tests basic additional parameter parsing for the commands that take 1 argument.
See Also:

    • withCorrectObject

      @ParameterizedTest @MethodSource("correctTestSource") void withCorrectObject(SingleArgumentCommandTest.CorrectTestCase<?> arg) throws NoSuchMethodException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException
      Checks that a SingleArgumentUserCommand is correctly created when passed a correct object

      Note: this test checks for correctness only for the more basic objects. For more detailed testing, see each class's specific test

      Throws:
      NoSuchMethodException
      InvocationTargetException
      InstantiationException
      IllegalAccessException
